v1:dataset.v1:title: Mating rate influences female reproductive investment in a simultaneous hermaphrodite, Lymnaea stagnalis
v1:dataset.v1:description: The dataset contains the data used to analyse the result of the study "Mating rate influences female reproductive investment in a simultaneous hermaphrodite, Lymnaea stagnalis" by Hoffer, Schwegler, Ellers and Koene, published in 2012 in Animal Behaviour 84: 523-529.
